A frontend dashboard interface that displays financial data from multiple companies
A backend API service that aggregates financial data from multiple company sources
Database connection to PostgreSQL using environment variables: DB_HOST, DB_PORT, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, DB_NAME
Consolidated financial reporting across all companies
Financial management tools for user interaction
Data visualization components for financial metrics
Responsive layout with mint cream background and teal-styled components
Real-time data fetching from backend APIs to frontend
Multi-tenant architecture supporting separate company data isolation
Administrative controls for managing company data sources
Package.json configuration with npm run install:all and npm run dev scripts
